extensions.name: PHP IntelliSense
extensions.description: Provides advanced autocompletion, code navigation, and reference searching for PHP.

extensions.name: PHP Intelephense
extensions.description: A high-performance PHP language server that provides instant feedback and code analysis.

extensions.name: MySQL
extensions.description: Tools for writing and managing SQL queries directly within the editor.

extensions.name: REST Client
extensions.description: Allows you to send HTTP requests and view responses directly in the editor.

extensions.name: XML Tools
extensions.description: Provides XML formatting, validation, and transformation capabilities.

extensions.name: GitLens
extensions.description: Supercharges the Git capabilities built into Visual Studio Code.

extensions.name: Live Server
extensions.description: Launch a development local server with live reload feature for static & dynamic pages.

extensions.name: Prettier - Code formatter
extensions.description: An opinionated code formatter that supports many languages.

extensions.name: ESLint
extensions.description: Integrates ESLint JavaScript into VS Code.

extensions.name: Copilot
extensions.description: AI-powered code suggestions to help you write code faster.
